name: Mohab's Skating Challenge
description:
Controls

RIGHT ARROW OR D FOR RIGHT

LEFT ARROW OR A FOR LEFT

SPACE FOR JUMP

S FOR SPEED

N FOR NORMAL SPEED

My age is 14, and skating games are my PASSION. Unfortunately the available games don't satisfy me, so i created this challenging game.
I am proud to say that i did it from scratch using Unity and with help of free models.
Difficulty level will change gradually, in each level you will face a different challenge, BELIEVE me it will be difficult to win the challenge except you are exceptional like me.
If you have my passion join the challenge now.
